channel.title: Linux on Shining Moon
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Shining Moon

item.title: Debug Skills on Linux
item.description: This post will show several command line debug skills on linux server, all examples are shown on ubuntu 18.04, some tools are not installed by default, you can installl by sudo apt install xxx. Some command must be used via sudo System resources can be classified in three main categories: compute, storage, and network. Usually, when you come to a performance issue, it’s always caused by exhaustion of those resources.
